name: PITS END
description:
WELCOME TO PITS END, MORTAL.
FREE THE EASTWARD-FACING WALL-SCUTTLE GREMLIN OF HIS EXISTENCE.
HOW MANY CAN YOU LIBERATE-
BEFORE YOU SUCCUMB TO THE WILL OF THE RISING SUN?

  • USE YOUR WEAPONS TO FIGHT THE INCOMING WALL GREMLINS
  • WHEN YOU RUN OUT OF AMMO, YOU SWAP, BUT SO DOES YOUR SPACE
  • POSITION CAREFULLY AS THE WALLS MAY SHIFT

RIGHT CLICK = DASH

WASD =  MOVE

LEFT CLICK = DISMEMBER
